alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 7:46AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong showers will impact portions of Haskell, south central Sequoyah, eastern Latimer and central Le Flore Counties through 815 AM CST... At 746 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong showers along a line extending from 2 miles northeast of Kinta to near Red Oak to 5 miles north of Kiamichi. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Sallisaw... Poteau... Stigler... Panama... Talihina... Wister... Keota... Red Oak... Mccurtain... Bokoshe... Fanshawe... Kinta... Talimena State Park... Bengal... Mc Curtain... Lake Wister State Park... Lequire... Shady Point... Cowlington... Kanima... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 306 and 307. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
